alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Lexington; Newberry; Richland; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Newberry, Lexington, north central Aiken, Saluda and central Richland Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saluda County Airport to near Gaston. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Forest Acres, Batesburg-Leesville, St. Andrews, Oak Grove, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, Dentsville, Saluda, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Arcadia Lakes, Ridge Spring, Columbia International University and Harbison State Forest. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 36 and 72. Interstate 26 between mile markers 101 and 119. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
